dumriya sthanaya idikirimata pera piti molwala karmika pahasukamwala parisaraya saha mema pahasukamwala sewaya karana kamkaruwan lewantayin pawulwala sakshikaruwan wiya. 1800 gananwala mul bhagayedi brithanya pawul kalapaye godanagiliwala wasaya kalaha. 1857 di otoman adhirajyaye palamu dumriya margaya wu ismir-ayidan margaye aththiwarama penwana wita, punta (alsankak) dumriya sthanaya wasarakata pasuwa sewayata yodawanu labiya.
